name: Survival 9
description:
A survival game where there are only 9 pixels visible at a given time. Inspired by:

How to play:

This game is turn based so things only happen when you move

You are the orange pixel, Pressing 1, 2, 3 cycles your three views

1 - Player (Just shows yourself)

2 - Hunger (Ranging from Green > Red, green being full/red being hungry)

3 - Thirst (Same thing)

Enemies are red, they give all tiles around them a shadow to show you where they are

Light blue tiles surrounding the island is salt water, you cannot go on salt water

Dark blue tiles in the island is fresh water, you can walk into them to recover thirst

Dark Green tiles are berry bushes, they periodically spawn Purple Berries which when moving into, recover your hunger. Berry bushes can be moved when walking into them.

Gray tiles are rocks, they can be moved and block the path of enemies

Enemies will periodically spawn, how long can you survive before being completely overrun by enemies?
